Text.Page:
The crocutas have attacked our supply caravan again!

First it was {@LinkCreature:9#300#armored crocutas}, and we doubled the size of the escort. But now {@LinkCreature:9#310#alpha crocutas} are hitting the caravans, too. And they're eating the guards for lunch.

Literally.

Get rid of the crocutas, , and bring back their hides. We can probably make blankets or something out of them, since we aren't getting supplies anytime soon.
We should be able to tan these before the next cold snap. And certainly before we actually see a supply wagon around here.
It's not just the supply situation. The {@LinkCreature:9#300#armored crocutas} and {@LinkCreature:9#310#alpha crocutas} are actually inflicting casualties. And we've got few enough soldiers to spare.
